posts.title: Nginx Config
posts.text: å‰æ®µæ—¶é—´å¯¹Nat VPSä¸Šçš„V2Rayè¿›è¡Œäº†ä¸€äº›è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Nginxå‰ç½®å¹¶è¿›è¡Œåä»£ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè´´ä¸€ä¸‹Nginx + H2 + TLS + WS + V2rayçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ Nginxé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶# /etc/nginx/config.d/h2w.confserver { listen [::]:443 ssl http2; # Nat VPS å¸¦ IPV6 server_name youdomian; index index.html; root /usr/share/nginx/html; # é™æ€é¡µé¢æ–‡ä»¶ error_page 404 400 500 502 503 504 /5xx.html; ssl_certificate /cert/server.pem; # TLSçš„å…¬é’¥ ssl_certificate_key /cert/server.key; # TLSçš„ç§é’¥ ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3; ssl_ciphers ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305:ECDHE-RSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384; # åœ¨ location åå¡«å†™ /ä½ çš„ pathï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯åŠ ?ed=2048å¯ä»¥é™ä½å»¶è¿Ÿ location /your_v2ray_path{ if ($http_upgrade != "websocket") { return 404; } proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:port; # è¿™é‡Œæ”¹ä¸ºä½ çš„v2rayç›‘å¬çš„ç«¯å£ proxy_redirect off; proxy_http_version 1.1; proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_read_timeout 52w; }}

pages.text: /* åˆ‡æ¢æŒ‰é’® */ #dark { cursor: pointer; position: fixed; right: 40px; bottom: 98px; width: 16px; height: 14px; z-index: 100; font-size: 20px; } /*æš—é»‘æ¨¡å¼*/ .dark { background-color: #282c34; /* èƒŒæ™¯é®ç½© */ /* ä¸»ä½“ */ /* é¡¶æ  */ /* page-number */ /* æ‰“å­—æœº */ /* back to top */ /* Toc */ /* footer */ /* å½’æ¡£é¡µ */ /* å‹é“¾é¡µ */ /* noteæ ‡ç­¾ é…è‰²æœ‰ç‚¹ä¸‘ */ } .dark .mask { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important; } .dark #board { background-color: #282c34; color: #a09c9c; } .dark img { filter: brightness(50%); } .dark p, .dark .index-info a { color: #a09c9c !important; } .dark .markdown-body h1, .dark .markdown-body h2, .dark .markdown-body h3, .dark .markdown-body h4, .dark .markdown-body h5, .dark .markdown-body h6, .dark .markdown-body s, .dark .markdown-body li { color: #a09c9c !important; } .dark .navbar-col-show, .dark .top-nav-collapse { background-color: #282c34; } .dark .navbar a { color: #a09c9c !important; } .dark .animated-icon span { background-color: #a09c9c; } .dark .pagination a:hover, .dark .pagination .current { background-color: rgba(107,107,107,0.451); } .dark #subtitle, .dark .dark.typed-cursor--blink, .dark .scroll-down-arrow { color: #dfdfdf; } .dark #scroll-top-button { background-color: #282c34; } .dark #scroll-top-button i { color: #a09c9c; } .dark .tocbot-list a { color: #a09c9c; } .dark .tocbot-active-link, .dark footer a:hover { color: #1abc9c !important; } .dark footer, .dark footer a { color: #a09c9c; } .dark .list-group-item { color: #a09c9c; background-color: #282c34; } .dark .list-group-item:hover, .dark .tagcloud a:hover { background-color: #46484d; } .dark .links .card { background-color: #282c34; } .dark .links .card-body:hover { background-color: #46484d; } .dark .links .link-title, .dark .links .link-intro { color: #a09c9c; } .dark .note-info { background-color: #3b5359; border-color: #006d80; } .dark .note-danger { background-color: #783f42; border-color: #670009; } .dark .note-success { background-color: #2a3e2e; border-color: #005915; } .dark .note-warning { background-color: #5b543e; border-color: #846500; } .dark .note-primary { background-color: #455a6f; border-color: #004188; }

$(document).ready(()=>{ console.log(document.getElementById('darkmode')) var isNight = new Date().getHours() >= 22 || new Date().getHours() < 7; // æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´ // ä¾æ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­ ç³»ç»Ÿæš—é»‘æ¨¡å¼ æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´ ç¼“å­˜ dark if( matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches || isNight || localStorage.getItem('dark') === '1') { if(!(isNight&&localStorage.getItem('noDark') === '1')) { document.body.classList.add('dark'); } } document.getElementById('darkmode').innerHTML = document.querySelector("body").classList.contains("dark")?"ğŸŒ™":"ğŸŒ"; console.log('load diy.js') }) function switchDarkMode() { if ($('body').hasClass('dark')) { $("#dark").html("ğŸŒ"); document.body.classList.remove('dark'); localStorage.setItem('noDark', '1'); localStorage.setItem('dark', '0'); } else { $("#dark").html("ğŸŒ™"); document.body.classList.add('dark'); localStorage.setItem('dark', '1'); localStorage.setItem('noDark', '0'); } }
